overview:
Seasoned marketing executive and business strategist with broad range of experience. At various points in his career, Gabriel has led teams responsible for product development, new customer acquisition, marketing, online advertising, customer marketing (cross-sell, engagement and retention), website marketing including site redesign, research, call center marketing, brand strategy, decision science, and major corporate strategy projects.

Gabriel has worked in the following industries (either directly or in consulting): -financial services (Chase, E*TRADE, Zecco), autos (GM), fashion eyewear (Ray Ban), electric utilities and deregulated energy (Entergy, NewPower), refrigerators (Maytag), beverages (Pepsi)

Specialties: Marketing, Online Advertising, Website Marketing, Direct Marketing, Product Management, Product Development, Service to Sales, Corporate Strategy, Research, CRM, Decision Science
